**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 131 1.1 **Tradition** [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2) **Cast** [material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284) **Requirements** You have a deity. **Range** 100 feet **Duration** until the end of your next turn --- Your faith is strong enough to briefly summon a direct representative of your deity, such as the deity's herald. The herald occupies the space of a Huge creature and has a Speed of 60 feet. The effects of this spell depend on your deity's alignment.
  • **Lawful Good**: **Arrive** ([enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [good](/Traits.aspx?ID=83), [lawful](/Traits.aspx?ID=99)) _Aura of Retribution_ While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's [Retributive Strike](/Actions.aspx?ID=5) reaction; **Depart** _Holy Smite_ The herald casts 5th-level [_divine wrath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=86) (choosing good) in a 100-foot emanation.
  • **Neutral Good**: **Arrive** ([enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [good](/Traits.aspx?ID=83)) _Aura of Redemption_ While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's [Glimpse of Redemption](/Actions.aspx?ID=6) reaction; **Depart** _Merciful Healing_ The herald casts the 3-action version of 5th-level [_heal_](/Spells.aspx?ID=148) with a radius of 100 feet. This spell targets only you and your allies.
  • **Chaotic Good**: **Arrive** ([chaotic](/Traits.aspx?ID=25), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [good](/Traits.aspx?ID=83)) _Aura of Liberation_ While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's [Liberating Step](/Actions.aspx?ID=7) reaction; **Depart** _Radiating Freedom_ The herald affects you and all your allies within 100 feet with [_freedom of movement_](/Spells.aspx?ID=128). The duration is reduced to 3 rounds.
  • **Lawful Neutral**: **Arrive** ([abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [lawful](/Traits.aspx?ID=99)) _Defy Chaos_ You and each ally within 100 feet of the herald gain resistance 20 against chaotic damage while the herald is present; **Depart** _Order's Wrath_ The herald casts 5th-level [_divine wrath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=86) (choosing lawful) in a 100-foot emanation.
  • **Neutral**: **Arrive** ([transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) _Quickening Ripple_ You and each ally within 100 feet of the herald are [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) while the herald is present, and can use the additional action to Step, Stride, or Strike; **Depart** _Sapping Beam_ The herald casts 6th-level [_enervation_](/Spells.aspx?ID=687) in a 100-foot line.
  • **Chaotic Neutral**: **Arrive** ([abjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=2), [chaotic](/Traits.aspx?ID=25)) _Defy Law_ You and each ally within 100 feet of the herald gain resistance 20 against lawful damage while the herald is present; **Depart** _Chaos Hammer_ The herald casts 5th-level [_divine wrath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=86) (choosing chaotic) in a 100-foot emanation.
  • **Lawful Evil**: **Arrive** _Aura of Iron_ While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's [Iron Command](/Actions.aspx?ID=552) reaction; **Depart** _Unholy Blight_ The herald casts 5th-level [_divine wrath_](/Spells.aspx?ID=86) (choosing evil) in a 100-foot emanation.
  • **Neutral Evil**: **Arrive** _Aura of Selfishness_ While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's [Selfish Shield](/Actions.aspx?ID=553) reaction; **Depart** _Infinite Despair_ The herald casts 5th-level [_crushing despair_](/Spells.aspx?ID=57) in a 100-foot cone.
  • **Chaotic Evil**: **Arrive** _Aura of Vengeance_ While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's [Destructive Vengeance](/Actions.aspx?ID=554) reaction; **Depart** _Weapon Hurricane_ The herald casts 5th-level [_weapon storm_](/Spells.aspx?ID=373) in a 100-foot cone, using d12 for the die size.
Herald Examples Each of the many deities of Golarion have their own herald; these are just a few of the most prominent.
  • **Lawful Good**: The Grand Defender ([Torag](/Deities.aspx?ID=18)), the Grim White Stag ([Erastil](/Deities.aspx?ID=6)), Hand of the Inheritor ([Iomedae](/Deities.aspx?ID=9))
  • **Neutral Good**: The Spirit of Adoration ([Shelyn](/Deities.aspx?ID=17)), Sunlord Thalachos ([Sarenrae](/Deities.aspx?ID=16))
  • **Chaotic Good**: Night Monarch ([Desna](/Deities.aspx?ID=5)), Thais ([Cayden Cailean](/Deities.aspx?ID=4))
  • **Lawful Neutral**: Lawgiver ([Abadar](/Deities.aspx?ID=1)), The Old Man ([Irori](/Deities.aspx?ID=10))
  • **Neutral**: Arcanotheign ([Nethys](/Deities.aspx?ID=12)), Personification of Fury ([Gozreh](/Deities.aspx?ID=8)), Steward of the Skein ([Pharasma](/Deities.aspx?ID=14))
  • **Chaotic Neutral**: The First Blade ([Gorum](/Deities.aspx?ID=7)), the Menotherian ([Calistria](/Deities.aspx?ID=3))
  • **Lawful Evil**: Basileus ([Asmodeus](/Deities.aspx?ID=2)), the Prince in Chains ([Zon-Kuthon](/Deities.aspx?ID=20))
  • **Neutral Evil**: Mother's Maw ([Urgathoa](/Deities.aspx?ID=19)), [the Stabbing Beast](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1007) ([Norgorber](/Deities.aspx?ID=13))
  • **Chaotic Evil**: Tarrasque ([Rovagug](/Deities.aspx?ID=15)), Yethazmari ([Lamashtu](/Deities.aspx?ID=11))
